sourceMeaningMnemonic: Climb onto the <radical>roof</radical> in <radical>spring</radical> to see the <kanji>truth</kanji>. The world is waking back up from winter and revealing the <kanji>reality</kanji> of what it is all around you.
meaningInfo: Imagine sitting comfortably on your roof as the world around you changes to spring. Snow melts and reveals all of the truths that have been obscured and hidden in winter.
readingMnemonic: At the moment, you're trying to learn the <kanji>truth</kanji> about the deer that is coming out of the snowy woods when you see not one, but two baby deer appear with it! <reading>Gee! Two</reading> (<ja>じつ</ja>) babies! You keep looking around and realize that all of the animals seem to have two babies that they had hidden in the snow.
readingInfo: Gee! Two babies! Reality sure is lovely.
